creator: martin.ginter@uniklinik-freiburg.de
text:
By long documents the presentation of the revision is incomplete.
There is no scrollbar that allows to look at the whole revision.

Solution:
insert scrollbars=yes in function showRevision(revision) 
file: ..src/modules-core/sitemanagement/usecases/tab/revision.jx

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text: Fixed in r774444. Thanks for the fix!
